args: const http = require('http'); const readline = require('readline'); const rl = readline.createInterface({input: process.stdin}); rl.on('line', (line) => { const req = http.request({hostname: 'localhost', port: 8000, path: '/mcp', method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}}, (res) => { let data = ''; res.on('data', (chunk) => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => console.log(data)); }); req.write(line); req.end(); });
